::Savanna::

She roars in pain from the blast and is knocked off Predator.
She lays on her side breathing heavily.  Her body shaking in pain 
from the fight.  She can hardly move.  She opens her commlink again.
She speak in between gasps,"Any maximal that can hear me,*pant* 
Protect the Ark.*pant* Spitfire dead, *pant* HotRod in trouble, 
*pant* I need help." she layed there with most of her energy spent 
and damaged.  She tried to get up but fell back down. She layed there 
motionless and unconsious. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:
> 
> 
> Predator screamed, trying to keep Savanna's claws at bay with his 
grenade 
> launcher, more cuts appearing on his hands, beginning to leak mech-
fluid.
> 
> Imprisoner fired a blast from his sonic blaster at the back of 
Savanna's legs.
> 
> Choran raised his laser rifle, taking aim at the back of Savanna's 
neck, 
> getting ready to fire.
